price: په هغو كې ښكته كتونكې د خپل نظر (حورې) دي چې تر هغوى مخکې نه كوم انسان لاس وروړى او نه پېري.
arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fīhinna qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
